doc:
Paul Capellani https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Capellani 0 Paul Capellani (September 9, 1877 – November 7, 1960) was a noted French silent film actor. His brother was the director Albert Capellani and his uncle the film director Roger Capellani who died May 1940 at the Battle of Dunkirk. He starred in some 100 films between 1908 and 1930. In 1920 he appeared in Guy du Fresnay's De la coupe aux lèvres. Paul_Capellani ( September_9_,_1877 – November_7_,_1960 ) was a_noted_French_silent_film_actor . His_brother was the_director_Albert_Capellani and his_uncle the_film_director_Roger_Capellani who died May_1940 at the_Battle of Dunkirk . He starred in some_100_films between 1908_and_1930 . In 1920 he appeared in Guy_du_Fresnay 's_De_la_coupe aux_lèvres .
